content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > show off your finished scarf in the > sweet bee crochet facebook community > click here 1 introducing the simple stitch skinny scarf by the name of the pattern you can probably guess that this isn t an overly complicated design in fact this pattern is so simple that it s perfect for working on while watching a movie or when you need a break from larger projects this pattern uses the basic stitches and provides an introduction to crocheting with increases and decreases made with fingering/sock weight yarn and a 4mm hook this design would be a great option for crocheters wanting to try working with a smaller weight yarn ***inside the pattern you will find *** * detailed written instructions * special stitch tutorials with direct links for detailed walk throughs * clear photos * required tools approximate yardage required ***materials needed *** * approximately 296-297 yards of sock weight/fingering weight yarn i used one hank of celtic raven fibres merino/stellina superwash in the sea glass colourway yardage amount does not include tassels * 4mm hook * yarn needle * scissors * measuring tape **this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products ** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
